comments_course: Students found the exams challenging but fair. Homework was time-consuming but helpful for understanding the material. Some students felt the feedback was vague and difficult to find, and the grading system on code quality was considered strict.
course_content: The course covered programming fundamentals, including Python basics, recursion, object-oriented programming, and data structures. Students gained a solid foundation in computer science and coding skills.
comments_professor: Professor Elmore's lectures were engaging and informative, with clear explanations and helpful examples. He was approachable and responsive to questions, although some students found the pace fast.
advice: Attend lectures and discussion sections regularly for better understanding. Start homework early and practice coding regularly. Be prepared for challenging exams and focus on understanding code quality requirements.
